preprocess module¶

class preprocess.preprocessing[source]¶

Bases: object

apply_redshift_correction(redshift_values, **kwargs)[source]¶

Apply redshift correction using a cosmological model.

Args: - redshift_values (pandas.Series or array-like): Redshift values. - **kwargs: Additional keyword arguments for FlatLambdaCDM.

Returns: - astropy.units.quantity.Quantity: Co-moving distances after correction.

ditch_units(df)[source]¶

Remove units from columns in a pandas DataFrame.

Args: - df (pandas.DataFrame): Input DataFrame containing columns with units.

Returns: - pandas.DataFrame: DataFrame with units removed.

impute(df, n_neighbors=5, id_included=True, id_name='ObjID')[source]¶

Fill missing numerical values using KNN imputation.

Args: - df (pandas.DataFrame): Input DataFrame. - n_neighbors (int): Number of neighbors for KNN imputation. - id_included (bool): Flag to indicate if Object ID should be excluded from imputation. - id_name (str): Name of the Object ID column.

Returns: - pandas.DataFrame: DataFrame with missing values imputed.

normalize(df, id_included=True, id_name='ObjID')[source]¶

Normalize numerical columns in a DataFrame.

Args: - df (pandas.DataFrame): Input DataFrame. - id_included (bool): Flag to indicate if Object ID should be excluded from normalization. - id_name (str): Name of the Object ID column.

Returns: - pandas.DataFrame: Normalized DataFrame.

remove_outliers(df, threshold=3, id_included=True, id_name='ObjID')[source]¶

Remove outliers using Z-score approach.

Args: - df (pandas.DataFrame): Input DataFrame. - threshold (int): Z-score threshold for identifying outliers. - id_included (bool): Flag to indicate if Object ID should be excluded from outlier removal. - id_name (str): Name of the Object ID column.

Returns: - pandas.DataFrame: DataFrame with outliers removed.
